author: Jade Scipioni
title: White House health advisor Anthony Fauci: These are the biggest misconceptions about coronavirus
description: "I want to get rid of that misconception that these extremes, that the world is going to end or we don't want to do anything," White House health advisor Anthony Fauci told NBA star Steph Curry about the COVID-19 pandemic on Thursday. The truth is "somewhere …
content:
White House health advisor Anthony Fauci said the biggest misconceptions about the COVID-19 pandemic are the extremes  on the one hand there are people who think "the world is going to end" and on the other, people "who don't even believe it [is real]."
